properties.areaDesc: Croatan and Roanoke Sounds; Alligator River; Albemarle Sound
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 2:09PM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND BUILDING SEAS THIS WEEKEND...

.Seas will gradually build tonight as southeasterly flow
increases. Southerly winds will increase to 15 to 25 knots
Saturday with seas building to 5 to 8 feet. A period of gale
force winds in gusts will be possible as winds peak Saturday
night into early Sunday. Winds will gradually diminish late Sunday
and Sunday night, but elevated seas will linger across the waters
into early next week.

* WHAT...South winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
choppy waters expected.

* WHERE...Albemarle, Croatan, and Roanoke Sounds and the
Alligator River.

* WHEN...From 10 PM Saturday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
